--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hitokiri Battousai was known for being one of the top killers in the country . His nickname , the Shredder , echoed all over the Japan Tired of so much killing , Himura abandons his sword in battle and takes an oath : defend justice , but do not kill anyone else. His weapon , however, was collected by one of the losers , Udo Jin -e.
Living as a wanderer and using a new name , Himura Kenshin , the former assassin wanders through the villages until ten years after his decision, he arrives in Tokyo. There, he meets Kaoru , a young woman who has inherited his father's dojo , and had the name humiliated by a swordsman who used the name Hitokiri Battousai . To prove that the suspects Kaoru is wrong , Himura shows her that he does not carry any sword , just a sakabato a reverse blade weapon .
At the same time , few crimes take place in the region and let the police into a tizzy , thinking that the legendary Shredder is in town . Actually , Udo Jin -e 's killing and letting the blame fall on Himura . When the two samurai duel , it all becomes clear . Beside the police officer , the boy goes hunting Jin -e to find out who is behind all this and clear his name . When Kaoru is kidnapped , it's time for real Battousai show their strength .
